title: Drinking: how will Charlie handle it?
brief_description: The film presents a variety of social and emotional factors which can influence an individual’s decision about drinking. Considers abstinence, drinking in moderation, and a number of consequences of excessive drinking. The film offers no conclusions but is designed to promote thought and discussion about the decision-making process regarding drinking.
